Title: Distributed sum
Introduction: A classic collective: the reduction. This exercise consists in writing an application where each process declares a variable containing a value equal to its MPI rank times 100. Then, all processes participate to a collective operation calculating the sum of all these variables and store the sum in a variable held on MPI process 0, which then prints it.
Hints:
- MPI_Init
- MPI_Comm_rank
- MPI_COMM_WORLD
- MPI_Reduce
- MPI_INT or MPI_INTEGER
- MPI_SUM
- MPI_Finalize
